newsitem.title: JAPAN: Pioneer rises on reported return to profit.
newsitem.headline: Pioneer rises on reported return to profit.

text.p: Shares of Pioneer Electronic Corp rose on Wednesday on the Tokyo Stock Exchange, due to a newspaper report that the company's earnings are expected to return to the black, traders said.
Pioneer gained 110 yen to 2,420 by 0101 GMT, and was the fourth largest percentage gainer on the first section of the bourse.
